title: "4G Capital Partners with CGAP to Develop Financial Stress Early Warning System"
excerpt: "Together with Social Performance Solutions (“SPS”), a consultancy firm supporting social impact organisations, 4G Capital and CGAP co-created a pilot scheme that researched and tested a client financial stress Early Warning System (‘EWS’)."
